page.title: 01 * *INTRODUCTION* *
page.content: This is an introduction for our pieces of work further on in this program. We hope you enjoy reading all about our area. {Southwell is}a small village North East from{Nottingham. The Minster}is one of the two attractions in {Southwell,}probably the largest of the two. It was built in the eleventh century. The other attraction of {Southwell}is the{Saracen's Head}which was a coaching inn and was built in the early twelfth century.Last year (1984) people crowded around the Minster to see the Queen.She had come to{Southwell}to give out some{Maundy {Money. {Southwell}is near a very small village called{Halloughton}and {Brackenhurst}which is a{College of {Agriculture.
